entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character who is thought to be dead.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A person waiting with Harry near the Willow tree.

entities.name: willow
entities.description: The tree where Hermione is sitting.

entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: A creature that raises its head when Harry and Hermione get up.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: One of the people who is climbing out of a hole in the roots.

entities.name: pettigrew
entities.description: Another person who is climbing out of a hole in the roots.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: A person who is climbing out of a hole in the roots.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione are waiting together near the Willow tree.
Harry sees Buckbeak raising its head when they get up.
Hermione is sitting under the Willow tree.
Lupin and Pettigrew are climbing out of a hole in the roots together.
Ron is also climbing out of a hole in the roots with Lupin.
